short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically completes your exercises on Memrise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates any memrise lessons, and once started you can step away from your computer as this extension will do all the work for you.

**INSTRUCTIONS**
Before activating it, please navigate to the "Classic Review" section of your assignment. From there, activate the extension and click "Start AutoClick".

Disclaimer: The use of this extension is intended for legitimate and ethical purposes only. The extension should not be used for any form of cheating, academic dishonesty, or any activity that violates the rules, policies, or codes of conduct set forth by educational institutions or any other organizations. The developer and distributor of this extension do not condone or endorse any misuse of the extension, and users are strongly advised to adhere to ethical standards and guidelines. Any inappropriate or unethical use of the extension is the sole responsibility of the user, and the developer shall not be held liable for such actions.
